title: Look for Unknown

products.name: Primer
products.description: e.l.f. Poreless Putty Primer - Apply a small amount to clean, moisturized skin, focusing on the T-zone.

products.name: Foundation
products.description: NYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Full Coverage Foundation - Use a foundation brush to apply a thin layer of the chosen shade evenly across the face, blending well into the neck.

products.name: Concealer
products.description: Milani Conceal + Perfect 2-in-1 Foundation + Concealer - Dot the concealer under the eyes, on any blemishes, and around the nose. Blend with a sponge or fingers.

products.name: Setting Powder
products.description: Wet n Wild Photo Focus Powder - Using a large, fluffy brush, dust the loose powder all over the face, focusing on the T-zone.

products.name: Brow Gel
products.description: e.l.f. Cosmetics Maximum Curl + Lift Browning Mascara - Brush through brows to define and shape, combing hairs into place.

products.name: Eyeshadow
products.description: Catrice Cosmetics Ultimate Sunset Palette - Apply a light transition shade to the crease using a blending brush, then build up the intensity with deeper shades on the outer corners.

products.name: Mascara
products.description: Physicians Formula Organic Wear Lash Boosting Mascara - Apply two coats of mascara to both upper lashes, focusing on the roots for maximum lift.

recommendation:
1. Primer: e.l.f. Poreless Putty Primer - Apply a small amount to clean, moisturized skin, focusing on the T-zone.
2. Foundation: NYX Professional Makeup Can't Stop Won't Stop Full Coverage Foundation - Use a foundation brush to apply a thin layer of the chosen shade evenly across the face, blending well into the neck.
3. Concealer: Milani Conceal + Perfect 2-in-1 Foundation + Concealer - Dot the concealer under the eyes, on any blemishes, and around the nose. Blend with a sponge or fingers.
4. Setting Powder: Wet n Wild Photo Focus Powder - Using a large, fluffy brush, dust the loose powder all over the face, focusing on the T-zone.
5. Brow Gel: e.l.f. Cosmetics Maximum Curl + Lift Browning Mascara - Brush through brows to define and shape, combing hairs into place.
6. Eyeshadow: Catrice Cosmetics Ultimate Sunset Palette - Apply a light transition shade to the crease using a blending brush, then build up the intensity with deeper shades on the outer corners.
7. Mascara: Physicians Formula Organic Wear Lash Boosting Mascara - Apply two coats of mascara to both upper lashes, focusing on the roots for maximum lift.
8. Lipstick: L'Oréal Paris Colour Riche Lipstick - Apply a creamy, long-lasting lipstick of your preferred shade to the lips. Use a lip liner if desired to prevent bleeding.

1. Sunscreen: EltaMD UV Clear Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 - Apply a thin layer onto face and neck 15 minutes before sun exposure.
2. Primer: e.l.f. Cosmetics Blemish Control Primer - Apply a small amount evenly onto the face and neck for a smooth base.
3. Concealer: NYX Professional Makeup HD Photo Concealer Wand - Dot concealer under eyes and on blemishes, blend with finger or a brush.
4. Foundation: L'Oréal Paris True Match Super-Blendable Makeup - Apply foundation all over the face and neck using a sponge or brush.
5. Setting Powder: e.l.f. Cosmetics Flawless Finish Blotting Powder - Lightly dust over the face to set makeup and control shine.
6. Bronzer: Physicians Formula Mineral Wear Talc-Free SPF 15 - Apply a light layer of bronzer to the cheeks, forehead, and nose for a sun-kissed look.
7. Mascara: L'Oréal Paris Voluminous Lash Paradise Mascara - Apply 2 coats on your top lashes.
8. Lip Balm: Aquaphor Lip Repair - Apply a layer of lip balm to keep your lips hydrated throughout the day.

For skincare, consider the following routine:

1. Cleanser: Neutrogena Ultra Gentle Hydrating Facial Cleanser - Massage onto wet skin, rinse off with warm water.
2. Toner: Thayers Witch Hazel Alcohol-Free Cucumber Rose Toner - Apply with a cotton pad onto clean skin.
3. Serum: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 - Apply a few drops onto cleansed skin, followed by moisturizer.
4. Moisturizer: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream - Apply a generous layer onto face and neck.
5. Sunscreen: EltaMD UV Daily Broad-Spectrum SPF 40 - Apply onto face and neck after your moisturizer and before makeup.

3. Concealer: NYX Professional Makeup HD Photo Concealer Wand - Dot concealer under eyes and on blemishes, blend with finger or a brush.

10. Toner: Thayers Witch Hazel Alcohol-Free Cucumber Rose Toner - Apply with a cotton pad onto clean skin.

1. Primer: e.l.f. Cosmetics Poreless Putty Primer - Apply evenly onto the face as a smooth base.

2. Foundation: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation - Apply onto the face for a medium to full coverage.

3. Concealer: e.l.f. Cosmetics Camo Concealer - Conceal under-eye circles and blemishes.

4. Setting Powder: Nyx Professional Makeup Bake and Set Loose Setting Powder - Lightly dust on the face to set the makeup.

5. Blush: e.l.f. Cosmetics Baked Blush - Apply onto the apples of the cheeks for a natural-looking flush.

6. Highlighter: Wet n' Wild Megaglo Highlighting Powder - Highlight the high points of the face, such as the cheekbones, bridge of the nose, and brow bone.

7. Eyeshadow Palette: Morphe 35O Eyeshadow Palette - Create a neutral eye look using a combination of matte and shimmer shades.

8. Mascara: Physicians Formula Révölumé + Argan Oil Mascara - Apply to lengthen and volumize the lashes, giving them a full and fluttery effect.

For skincare:

1. Cleanser: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser - Cleanse the skin to remove impurities and excess oils.

2. Toner: Thayers Rose Petal Witch Hazel - Apply toner to help balance the skin's pH and prepare it for the next steps.

3. Spot Treatment: Neutrogena On-the-Spot Acne Treatment - Dab onto any active acne to help reduce redness and speed up healing.

4. Serum: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Serum - Apply a few drops onto the face, neck, and décolletage for added hydration and anti-aging benefits.

5. Moisturizer: Cetaphil Daily Facial Moisturizer - Smooth onto the face and neck for long-lasting hydration.

6. Sunscreen: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen SPF 45 - Apply a generous layer onto the face, neck, and hands to protect the skin from harmful UV rays.

7. Overnight Treatment: The Ordinary 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rosehip Seed Oil - Apply a few drops onto the face and massage gently to nourish and heal the skin while sleeping.

8. Eye Cream: Olay Eyes Ultimate Eye Cream - Gently pat around the eye area to help reduce the appearance of dark circles and fine lines.

recommendation:
1. Primer: e.l.f. Cosmetics Poreless Putty Primer - Apply evenly onto the face as a smooth base.
2. Foundation: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Foundation - Apply onto the face for a medium to full coverage.
3. Concealer: e.l.f. Cosmetics Camo Concealer - Conceal under-eye circles and blemishes.
4. Setting Powder: Nyx Professional Makeup Bake and Set Loose Setting Powder - Lightly dust on the face to set the makeup.
5. Blush: e.l.f. Cosmetics Baked Blush - Apply onto the apples of the cheeks for a natural-looking flush.
6. Highlighter: Wet n' Wild Megaglo Highlighting Powder - Highlight the high points of the face, such as the cheekbones, bridge of the nose, and brow bone.
7. Eyeshadow Palette: Morphe 35O Eyeshadow Palette - Create a neutral eye look using a combination of matte and shimmer shades.
8. Mascara: Physicians Formula Révölumé + Argan Oil Mascara - Apply to lengthen and volumize the lashes, giving them a full and fluttery effect.
9. Cleanser: CeraVe Hydrating Facial Cleanser - Cleanse the skin to remove impurities and excess oils.
10. Toner: Thayers Rose Petal Witch Hazel - Apply toner to help balance the skin's pH and prepare it for the next steps.
11. Spot Treatment: Neutrogena On-the-Spot Acne Treatment - Dab onto any active acne to help reduce redness and speed up healing.
12. Serum: Olay Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Serum - Apply a few drops onto the face, neck, and décolletage for added hydration and anti-aging benefits.
13. Moisturizer: Cetaphil Daily Facial Moisturizer - Smooth onto the face and neck for long-lasting hydration.
14. Sunscreen: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen SPF 45 - Apply a generous layer onto the face, neck, and hands to protect the skin from harmful UV rays.
15. Overnight Treatment: The Ordinary 100% Organic Cold-Pressed Rosehip Seed Oil - Apply a few drops onto the face and massage gently to nourish and heal the skin while sleeping.
16. Eye Cream: Olay Eyes Ultimate Eye Cream - Gently pat around the eye area to help reduce the appearance of dark circles and fine lines.

1. Cleanser: Rare Beauty Pure Harmony Gel Cleanser - Apply a small amount on dry hands, add water, and gently massage onto face, then rinse off with warm water.

2. Toner: First Aid Beauty Ultra Repair Hydrating Toner - Apply toner to a cotton pad and sweep it over your face and neck.

3. Moisturizer: Supergoop! City Sunscreen Serum SPF 37 - Apply a few drops to your face and neck, and massage until fully absorbed.

4. Primer (optional for rosacea): Murad Invisiblur Perfecting Shield Broad Spectrum SPF 30 - Apply a thin layer evenly over your face and neck.

5. Foundation: Rare Beauty Liquid Touch Weightless Full Coverage Foundation - Apply with a foundation brush, starting at the center of the face and blending outward.

6. Concealer: Rare Beauty Perfect Strokes Concealer - Apply to areas you wish to conceal, such as under eyes and any redness.

7. Blush: BareMinerals Gen Nude Blush - Apply a small amount to the apples of your cheeks and blend upwards and outwards towards your temples.

8. Lip Balm with SPF: Supergoop! Play + Antioxidant-Infused Lip Balm SPF 30 - Apply lip balm to your lips for hydration and sun protection.

For the beach, you may also want to consider setting your makeup with a translucent powder to prevent sweating and wear a water-resistant mascara like Fenty Beauty Full Frontal Volume, Lift & Curl Mascara. Don't forget to reapply sunscreen regularly and stay hydrated throughout the day!

1. Cleanser: Neutrogena Hydrating Facial Cleanser - Wet face, apply cleanser, massage gently, rinse off.

2. Toner: Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water - Soak cotton pad, swipe over face and neck.

3. Exfoliant: e.l.f. Salicylic Acid Exfoliating Cleanser - Apply, massage gently, rinse off.

4. Serum: The Ordinary Hyaluronic Acid 2% + B5 - Dispense a few drops, pat onto face and neck.

5. Moisturizer: Simple Kind to Skin Hydrating Moisturizer - Apply evenly onto face and neck.

6. Primer: NYX Angel Veil Skin Perfecting Primer - Apply a small amount onto face, focusing on areas prone to shine.

7. Foundation: Fenty Beauty Pro Filt'r Soft Matte Longwear Liquid Foundation (if desired for full coverage) or e.l.f. Flawless Finish Foundation (for lighter coverage) - Apply with a foundation brush or beauty sponge.

8. Setting Powder: e.l.f. Cosmetics Flawless Finish Powder - Apply with a powder brush, concentrating on T-zone for oil control. Finish with a few spritzes of Urban Decay All Nighter Setting Spray for all-day wear.
